_description: Priority to weight mapping for recommendation scoring. Weights are used to calculate the balanced score in recommendations.

_rationale.accuracy: Most users prioritize good model quality. Higher weights reflect this importance.
_rationale.cost: Cost is important but slightly less than accuracy. Reflects budget-conscious decision making.
_rationale.latency: Primarily handled by SLO targets. Acts as a tie-breaker in balanced scoring.
_rationale.complexity: Simpler deployments are easier to manage. Acts as a tie-breaker like latency.
